{{Infobox Radio station |name = Yes FM |image = |city = [[Colombo]], [[Sri Lanka]] |area = {{flagicon|Sri Lanka}} Sri Lanka - National |branding = |slogan = #1 Hit Music Station in Sri Lanka |frequency = [[FM broadcasting|FM]]: 89.5 [[megahertz|MHz]] - 88.2 MHz Kandy
88.2 MHz Southern Sri Lanka
89.5 MHz Colombo
101.0 MHz Central Sri Lanka |airdate = 10 December 1993 |translator = |repeater = |airdate = |share = |share as of = |share source = |format = [[Contemporary Hit Radio]] |power = |erp = |haat = |class = |facility_id = |coordinates = |callsign_meaning = |former_callsigns = |affiliations = |owner = [[Capital Maharaja|The Capital Maharaja Organization Ltd.]] |licensee = |sister_stations = [[Sirasa FM]], [[Shakthi FM]], Y FM |webcast = [http://yesfmmusic.com/live_windows_media.html] |website = [http://yesfmonline.com] }} '''Yes FM''' (89.5 [[FM broadcasting|F.M.]]) is an English [[Radio broadcasting|radio station]] in [[Sri Lanka]]. Yes FM plays principally [[Contemporary Hit Radio]]. Yes FM commenced broadcasting on December 10, [[1993]] at 6.00 am.{{cite web|url=http://sundaytimes.lk/081214/TV/sundaytvtimes_12.html|title=Celebrating the trend-setting and positive energy of YES!|date=Sunday December 14, 2008|accessdate=2009-01-01}} It is one of the radio channels owned by [[Capital Maharaja|The Capital Maharaja Organization Ltd]], a leading conglomerate in Sri Lanka. The main target audience age groups are Teens and Young Adults. Its broadcast ranges from [[Contemporary hit radio|Contemporary hit music]] to breaking news. The station is known for organizing live gigs which feature artists from outside Sri Lanka. Previous performers include [[Inner Circle (reggae band)|Inner Circle]], [[Vengaboys]], [[DJ BoBo]], [[Michael Learns To Rock]], [[Air Supply]], [[Michael Bolton]], [[UB40]], [[Ali Campbell]] and [[Kid Massive]]. ==Presenters and Shows== Yes FM's [[Disc jockey#Types#Radio disc jockeys|DJs]] are some of the most popular in Sri Lanka. Since its inception the station has played host to a number of International DJ's. ===Presenters=== {{col-start}} {{col-2}} * Steven Stone * Shaq * Ryan * Cole Taylor * Ramzi * Blessie * Axl Young * Jude * Deyna "As Quoted by Shehara*" * Shehara* * Shane * Sam * Ray {{col-end}} ===Shows=== {{col-start}} {{col-2}} * Morning Show * Daily Dose * Take Away Requests * Audio Tonic * T.R.S * Legends * Lounge 895 * Friday Showdown * Audio Vault * Phat 30 * Score * Speak Easy * Release Yourself with Roger Sanchez * Club Life * Hedkandi Radio Show * Rick Dees Weekly Top 40 * Dave Koz Radio Show * Brazilian Hour {{col-end}} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://yesfmonline.com Yes FM official website] {{coord missing|Sri Lanka}} [[Category:Contemporary hit radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Sri Lanka]] [[Category:Capital Maharaja]]
